purpose: To identify and highlight potential bugs in a codebase using AI techniques
principle: Utilizes machine learning models trained on code patterns to detect anomalies and potential bugs
reusability: Can be integrated into development workflows with API support, customizable for different codebases
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may not cover all programming languages or complex code structures
name: suss
description: AI-powered bug finder that knows your codebase
highlight: AI-driven bug detection tailored to your specific codebase
